page.title: 04MORWELLHAM -VICTORIAN DRESS
page.content: The {Victorian Costumes}worn at { {Morwellham }are made there.They are copies of real ones.They are made by a team of three ladies who work most days to help with the costumes.They work upstairs in the {Ship Inn}.We went upstairs and they showed us some real things such as ladies hats and a parasol and copies they had made. They make big top hats,dresses, bonnets,umbrellas,waistcoats and big coats.They buy the material and then make the clothes.We saw aprons and the hoops for a crinoline dress.The dresses have some pearls and are very long. They had to change some of the ladies costumes because they could not work behind the shop counters with crinolines on because the hoops kept getting stuck.
